Package com.example.datavirus

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OnChartElementActions  
    OnDPCDataReady
    This interface should be implemented if an UI wants to be updated by external calls from another instance
    OnDPCGeoListener
    This interface should be implemented in classes for listening the DPCGeoPicker
    OnTileClick  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChartActivity
    Activity that holds and plots the chart, including list of elements plotted
    ChartElementsList
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    ChartModel
    This class is used for hold data to plot in a chart.
    DailyReport
    This class contains a single daily report, obtained via italian Dipartimento di Protezione Civile.
    DataNotifyReceiver
    Broadcast Receiver that checks if exists a new daily update in COVID data in DPC.
    DataParser
    This class downloads JSONs from the Dipartimento della Protezione Civile's GitHub repository.
    DataTilesFragment
    Fragment that shows tiles about various FieldGeographicElement obtained via StarredTileSaver Or for a static Geographic Element, showing all fields contained in that reports
    DPCData
    Objects from this class will contain data from Nazionale, Regionale and Provinciale sections.
    DPCGeoPicker
    The picker for a new GeographicField element
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FieldGeographicElement
    Contains also a field (like "casi_totali" or "dimessi_guariti")
    GeographicElement
    Class that represent a geographic element with its type, as GeoField
    LoadingDialog
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    MainActivity  
    ManageStarredTiles
    Singleton class for read and write the tiles starred
    StarredActivity
    Activity that shows the starred tiles.
